reviews.review_text: For years I've been using the regular Duo adhesive and it worked well.  I always choose the clear varieties so I don't have to be quite so careful and precise with my application.  Like with the any adhesive, applying it and letting it get tacky is key, especially since this stuff is so watery.  I like the brush-on feature because I can control the amount much better and it does dry very clear.   I use this every day and I find it works well, with needing only an occasional touch-up here and there, which is another reason the brush is ideal.  Typically, for me, I apply it very early in the morning (6am) and it lasts until I go to bed (anytime after 10pm) without any problems.   There have even been times I've slept in my lashes and not had any areas where the lashes lifted.  This stuff is very sticky.  Getting it anywhere else, your eyelid, fingers, even the ends of my lashes (which I have done multiple times) can be a bit of a pain, but a small sacrifice for the convenience of the brush and durability.

LET ME EXPLAIN. This glue is nothing I've ever used before. This glue was so firm and lasting. I applied lashes at 7:30 this morning. Went on a crying rampage to my boyfriend for like 3 hours. And they're still on like I didn't shed a million tears. Plus the white color turns translucent when it's dry so you know exactly when to apply the lashes. 5/5 stars. This product deserves it.

reviews.review_title: I watched the notebook wearing this
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing falsies for seven years now, and this is my go to adhesive. It doesn't smell the best, but it isn't overpowering. You can cry over Ryan Gosling all you want with this adhesive. My lashes never fall off. Bury me with this adhesive when I die.

Good product, does its job.   Issue is that it doesn't dry clear, it leaves white dry glue patches at the end of the day when i remove my lashes... and will take several days to come off at times even with makeup remover/soap/water (I also do not like to rub my eye). Though I am still new at this, will probably take more practice.
if my eyes water slightly, half of my eyelash will have come off and i will not be able to reattach it afterwards. this glue is terrible and definitely can't compare to the HOL eyelash glue.

reviews.review_title: Best Lash Glue, but the tube is better.
reviews.review_text: I swear by Duo. I've been wearing fake lashes almost everyday for 7 years and nothing even compares to Duo. For some, the brush applicator makes it easier to apply, but I just find the tube is better. I don't know if it's because you can get a bit more onto the lashes, I'm sure the formulation is identical. Whatever is easier for you, but I recommended squeezing from a tube directly onto the lashes for a better application and stronger hold.

I wore lashes to my prom and it was my first time wearing lashes. I used this eyelash glue to put them on. I was surprised they stayed on through the sweaty dancing and dinner, then the after party i got dragged through mud and then slept on them and they stayed oN IN THE EXACT POSITION THAT I PUT THEM ON!! AMAZING PRODUCT 5 STARS
Went to six flags and my eyelashes stayed on 10 rides later. Don't want to use army other product ever again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wear false eyelashes every so often (a couple of times per month), and I use this stuff every time ... the little brush is perfect, it is long lasting however, comes off when you want it to!

I'm not a person who wears lashes everyday, so the clear one was the best choice for me. I really like this new version with the iridescent to it. I do like this stuff by itself for a short shift (4-5) day, but not longer. What I did was put a layer of the HOL clear one on the middl and the end to help it stick more. I like the mixture a lot better than by itself.
Honestly this stuff works sooo well and lasted for 12 hours on me for my friends wedding, even through some tears. This is a must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: I have an allergy to latex and this is the best lash adhesive.The only one I will ever buy. A sephora make up artist recommended this to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my prom lashes last minute and it was great ! Easy to apply and stayed on all night. The thing is that is WANTED TO STAY ON. I tried to take them off and couldn't on the verge of tears. I rubbed my eyes for 10 mins with coconut oil. I mean it did it job but can with a price.
Every time I try to put the cap back on, the glue leaks out and it's really annoying. It also stings my eyes when I try to put on my lashes. Not good at all.
Nothing to complain about here.
I have hooded eyes and after applying my false lash with this glue, few hrs later it would transfer all over my lids. Waste of money

I have been using the DUO brand for years and decided to try this one out. Doesn't work! The first one came at my doorstep which was left outside. It says on the bottle not to freeze! And so... it turned out unusable. I then tried it again buying it from another retailer, and even then the product wasn't useable. It doesn't spread on my eyelashes at all. It saddens me that I never got to use the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this falsie glue. Easy to apply, no smell, dries quickly and goes on clear. Holds all day!

I bought this right after my Beauty Class on false lashes at Sephora and I love it. I have other DUO glues but this one is my favorite mainly because of the applicator. I'm never going back to tubes anymore! It is also latex and formaldehyde free!

Normally i love this glue!!! If i knew this product would render un-useble when ordered in colder climates... i wouldnt have order it. Please do not order this in cold climates like winter or else it is unusable upon delivery.
This is my favourite lash glue. The brush makes it very easy to apply. I used to use the other duo glue with the blue writing (white/clear one) and couldn't stand the smell.
This lashes glue is just so perfect.  It stick on my eyes for like good 17 hours.
Used this glue for the first time.  Works great.  Lasted all day at work. I even fell asleep with my lashes on. Woke up and glue still did its job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: this product is trash. The actual product makes my eyes water and sting when it didn't even go in it. The lashes didn't stay on at all and wouldn't even place at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Worked amazingly! Kept my lashes on all night, and super easy to apply.

seriously. this eyelash glue keeps my lashes on all day ! when applying your lashes it becomes perfectly tacky so easily and then your lashes look flawless. people have said the white glue is noticeable? but, it dries down completely clear very quickly for me. you don't not have 2 scrub to remove this glue unless you add a ton! this glue also does not hurt and pull out lashes when taking out your false lash. it has an EXTREMELY helpful brush tip applicator that makes applying the glue to the lash 100 times easier. i recommend it one hundred percent! this price btw is on point, like 9 is a bargain. if you even were false lashes on the accession pick this up! it is even worth it if you use it once, best ever. highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The product works great. Dries well if you use it properly. Best thing is that it is clear/white.

Honestly, I loved this adhesive at first, as it made many of my lashes a lot easier to apply. Just a few days later, though, I began to realise that the glue was very noticeable. It's a shade of white and doesn't become clear when it dries, which I found quite annoying.

While I was traveling, I bought a cheaper eyelash glue at a drugstore because I forgot this product at home. It was astonishing the difference between this glue and other glues! I love it and have no reason not to keep re-purchasing it.
Really happy with this! I've always had a hard time applying fake eyelashes, but this glue has made it sooooo much easier! And it dries relatively quick, which I like.

I bought this due to the ingredients but the adhesive liquid is thin which can make it tricky to get lashes to stay on. On the other hand, that fact that the adhesive is so thin it makes the lash line look more natural. It dries clear but has a bit of shine so I usually put on liquid eyeliner after the lashes are applied and dried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am an eyelash junkie! If I do not have eyelash extensions then I am wearing banded lashes. The applicator is great and it helps you use the least amount needed to properly adhere your lashes to your lids. I used to buy just the tube and squeeze the product which was messy and I usually ended up using too much. If you use too much glue the false lashes end up looking false which is what you do not want. This one is perfect and it dries clear. Precise application and long lasting!
Bristles of the applicator were going in all directions. It did not help lashes stick. Hated it.
Love the brush applicator! Makes life so easy

This DEFINTELY dries clear! It gets tacky faster than other lash glues, which I love because I am very impatient. It also stays on strong! My eyes get watery all the time and it stays! The brush is also good for touch ups incase of the problem of when it comes off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've used it once and it's already my favorite. I have tried the original Duo lash glue in the little squeezie tube, but it has never worked out well for me. Either too much comes out, or not enough. And for some reason it barely ever kept my lashes on. If you're looking for something quick, easy to apply and that actually works, buy it now! Very happy with this purchase. Makes me want to wear lashes more often.

I've used a lot of lash glues, but none as good as this one! The brush applicator makes the glue so much easier to apply and makes the glue much more even on the lashes! It's literally superglue - my lashes never lift up and last 14  hours with no issues or touch-ups needed. A little goes a long way too, AMAZING!
Bought this because I kept making a mess with the duo glue. Love this. Much easier to apply. Lashes stayed on. No mess. Will purchase again.

wanted a lash glue that had a brush to apply and hoped this would be the one but it wasnt. this glue is sticky in the worst way possible. in humid weather it doesnt keep a hold on the lashes and they start to come off but the glue wont come off if you accidentally get it anywhere. this glue also sticks to my lash line for days even if i use an oil cleanser. im not going to repurchase
I switched to a brush on adhesive on a whim and it's the best thing I've done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I originally bought the glue because of the attached brush and the white to blue coloring to assist me in the application of my lashes but when I used it I got more than I expected. This glue is so durable- tough enough to keep my lashes on for an extended period of time but not too tough in which I can't get my lashes off when I need to. I love this glue.

reviews.review_title: like super glue for your lashes
reviews.review_text: This glue definitely has great holding power. The brush makes it so much easier to apply. Don't get it in your lashes though real or fake it is almost impossible to get out.

False eyelashes are a staple in my everyday looks, and of all the adhesives I've tried for my lashes, this glue is at the top of my list. It gets tacky faster than any other brand I've tried, and sticks on like nothing I've ever seen.   I am a very sensitive and emotional person but you will never find me sacrificing my makeup for anything, and needless to say I was very surprised that even after a bad breakup and crying my eyes out and watching rom-coms, my lashes stayed gripping for life even while saturated with tears! They stuck so much that while my lashes stayed put, they ended up getting out of shape.   Overall, this glue exceeded my expectations.  Bravo, DUO.

this has made my life so much easier.  I wear lashes every day and not having to deal with gobs of glue is great.  I used to waste so much glue because I would have to pour some out and then use something to put it onto the lashes.  Why didn't they think of this sooner!
Ladies, ladies, ladies. If you wear false lashes, you NEED to be using this adhesive. (tip: let it dry for 30 seconds before you actually apply to your eye).

reviews.review_title: Mixed- likely would not buy again
reviews.review_text: i bought this product after taking the lashes course at my local sephora thinking it would be easier for me as a novice to apply. It was slightly but I felt like as opposed to the regular DUO I've purchased several times that it was much stickier in a bad way-- you get it slightly on your fingers or the lashes and it's destroyed. I don't know if I got a defective product but mine was also very leaky. not a huge fan
Super easy to use and I LOVE how tacky it gets! It makes lash application really quick and easy, and those lashes aren't going to budge at all throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying I love DUO. However, I will not buy this again. You can still see the glue after it dries. It's also SUPER tacky... if you miss and hit a piece of the lash or your fingers, it's impossible to get off. I also find my lashes don't stay on as well as with the regular DUO. Definitely not sweatproof. Buy the regular DUO, you'll be much happier.
Yes! Sooo much easier to apply its Amazing!! You will not go wrong with this purchase!
great Stuff, the color change helps know how long to let it set
Was super easy to apply to lashes and stayed on all night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like the brush applicator on this glue. It makes applying the glue SO easy and mess free. My only complaint is the glue dries white, not clear so covering it up is a pain. Other than that it sticks so well and keeps my lashes on all day. Would definitely repurchase.
I love that you don't have to wait to apply. I've always had trouble finding that sweet spot of time and was able to get them attached the first shot on both eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product holds great without leaving sticking residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wear strip lashes nearly everyday and this is my favourite lash adhesive. I like the brush applicator and that your lash is ready to apply after only a couple moments. It also stays a lot cleaner around the rim than other brands I've used.

Here's my honest opinion of this product: it's not worth it. The glue is SO sticky that if you get just a tiny speck of it on your fingers then it'll make applying lashes difficult. The brush applicator barely picks up any glue, so you have to keep dipping and layering glue. I got a little glue on the bottle itself and tried to get it off.. But my fingers and the bottle ended up getting sticky. Btw, my bottle was sticky for DAYS. I had to wrap it in something just to hold it.

reviews.review_title: Windproof, easy to apply, but not sweatproof.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely thank for the brush. It doesn't let you apply more than what you need. I used this on my thin band lashes when I went to San Francisco and sat on the double decker bus through the golden gate bridge and I thought I would lose my lashes with the powerful wind; they did stay on, especially the inner corner lashes. However, when I went through ballet class, almost sopping wet with sweat, more than the small usual portion of my inner corner and the outer corner came off, despite the putting more glue on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's a good glue. But I find the brush hard to use on falsies.  It is supposed to dry clear, but it is still visible after drying.

reviews.review_title: If you wear contacts and have sensitive eyes
reviews.review_text: As someone who wear contacts and has naturally sensitive eyes (allergies, environment, occasional irritation from dry eyes), I stopped wearing false lashes altogether because I couldn't stand the burning and stinging from latex last glue. It actually took me a while to realize I was reacting to the lash glue! I had no reaction whatsoever with this lash glue and the applicator makes the lashes experience a lot easier, especially when're in a rush.  Great product, good price, will buy again!

I've used a lot of different eyelash glues in the past year trying to find one that didn't make my eyes feel like they were burning and that kept my eyelashes on all day without having to reply glue and worrying about them coming off at the corners. this eyelash glue is it !! it's everything I was looking for and I will never use another glue again. this one applies super easy with a brush and keeps lashes on all day. I don't have to worry about checking my lashes every second of the day anymore.
Only glue I use! Love it, applies nicely, stays clean.

I've been wearing false eyelashes for over 8 years. I've tried every glue I've ever seen. This is the only one I'll ever use! I've only used it a few times but it doesn't irritate, lashes last all day, doesn't leave that shiny streak on my eyeliner & ive never had to reapply!

This is the best eyelash adhesive I've used! I go through phases where I stop wearing lashes for a few months and when I decide to start wearing them again I always struggle with applying them for a bit. This glue makes it so easy.   I was getting my makeup done at Sephora and the artist used this and told me NOT to wait 10-30 seconds after putting the glue on to apply the lash. She told me to do it right away. That's what I've been doing and I haven't had any problems with them staying.   To all the reviewers saying they couldn't get the lashes to stick with this glue, it's because you're waiting too long and you let the glue dry too much. I see some saying they wait 10 seconds and get good results. It works fine for me if I don't wait at all, it gives you a bit of time to make adjustments. Once you apply pressure though, they stick. Absolutely DO NOT wait 30 seconds though.   The one thing I don't like about this glue is it does leave behind some on your real lashes that is hard to get off. I just put a thick eye makeup remover on a clean lash comb and brush through a few times, which always does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: dries fast and very easy to use with the brush applicator also lasts all night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: My lashes last all day with this adhesive. I don't have to worry about carrying it around for a touch up (although I do any-force of habit I guess).  The brush is so very convenient.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use even for newbies
reviews.review_text: I dont use false lash very often at all and this tool makes it so much easier to apply than in the past when I had to rely on the gel and it never came out right. Highly recommend this for easy application!

I used to use the house of lashes glue which is also latex free and this one I'd say is easier to remove but behaves very similarly. I still find my eyes a bit sensitive when first applied but that's just me not the glues fault. Solid alternative to the original formula. Good staple to have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This dries so quick which works to my favor. I'm a newbie in lash application and this is the best glue I have used thus far.

I originally tried the Sephora brand glue (that comes with the Sephora lashes) but couldn't get my lashes to stay on longer than 5-10 minutes.  Tried this, upon a friends request and fell in love. I will NEVER go to another brand of lash glue!

I had such trouble learning to put on lashes for years but after Sephora introduced me to this glue I actually got the hang of it. The glue is perfect consistency I haven't found any other glue even close to as good as this one.
No were near as good as the original formula. Lashes come right off
Gets the job done, without the annoying tube and trying hard to not squeeze too much out! However I don't think it is much better than anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was originally using glue that you squeeze out of a tube, but this is so much better!!!! The glue just brushes on and you know when it is dry because the color goes from blue to clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is so easy to use. I hate trying to use a tube for my eyelashes as it can go everywhere. The wand applicator is really good. My lashes stayed on all night.

This glue came highly recommended from a lot of people and had fantastic reviews. I thought, I'm tired of the original DUO glue, why not try something new? This product was terrible! It took twice as long to glue on my lashes. I had to apply glue 3x because it would not stick to my eyes. I tried them with different types of lashes and bands. After the lashes finally glued on, it DID last all day and looked awesome. BUT the process was just too much hassle. ALSO when it was time to remove the lashes they came off fine, but glue was still left behind, matted in my real lashes. It was very suffix to remove the glue residue. I tried everything and the next day instill had random glue on my lashes that I couldn't get out. I won't be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_title: Love the Product, Hate the Packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Due to alopecia, I use false eyelashes pretty much every day.  I agree that this product is superior to the Duo tubes when it comes to staying power, ease of application and for providing less eye irritation.  However, I have to ding it one star for the packaging, as I find the storage tube itself leaky and messy.  Granted, it's not enough to make me stop buying this product (I'm on my fourth tube), but a stronger seal on the brush handle would make this product perfect.

I just bought a new tube of Duo before I came across this and had to buy it anyway. I'll never use the old tubes again. The brush makes it so much easier to put the glue right where you want it to go and it works just as well as their other formulas.   For those who've had problems, I suggest fanning the lash for 10 seconds or so and then put it on. I'd think waiting any longer, *especially* 30-60 seconds, would make it set too much and it won't stick. 10 seconds of fanning gives it just enough time to set a bit so it'll stick, but still gives you enough wiggle room to adjust.
Seriously the best invention ever. I'm actually upset that no one thought of it sooner. No reason to ever use the old tube again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is pure genius!! No more messy air bubbles to blow out the end and get glue on everything and everywhere. I love that it has a brush because sometimes the ends(most of the time)need more glue but it ends up on the lashes and NOT the band. NOT ANYMORE! You can brush directly on to the band where needed and if you need more and are worried about it running on the lashes then just brush a little on the corners on to the eye and watch the magic(after30-60-seconds,letting glue set up). Your falsies will stay in place like never before because everyone has had a lash or two pop up after just applying them and this is great because when that happens go in with the brush right where you need it and wait 30 sec. and push the lashes back down,WALLA!! PERFECT LASHES EVERY TIME!!!

reviews.review_title: I have sensitive eyes so this was perfect
reviews.review_text: This is the only glue from Duo that in formaldehyde free (what a surprise right?). My eyes are very sensitive and this lash glue made it easy for me to wear falsies. Unlike some other reviews, it actually keeps my lashes on LONGER than the other adhesives I've used!

I refuse to try any other glue because this one works so well for me. I wear false eyelashes daily and with this glue they stay on all day, they're easy to take off and the bottle will last me months. The brush makes application very easy. The only problem I found is that after some time the glue will start to build up around the lid but it's nothing too serious. I also wear contacts and have never once had any irritation occur which is great.
Didnt hold as good as the duo , was bad and falling off as soon as i left the house

reviews.review_title: Does what it's supposed to do
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: A thin coat keeps the eyelashes on but lets them peel off nicely. It doesn't make wearing false eyelashes any more comfortable, unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Easy to work with, adheres securely easy off too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Applying false lashes is torture for me (idk when I'll master the art) but this glue makes it a lot easier! I love that it goes on white but then dries clear and the brush makes everything sooo much easier. What the amazing girls at Sephora Pru Center told me is to apply the glue on the lash, fan the lash for like 10 seconds to let it dry a bit and then apply. Works like a charm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: In the middle of a cheer competition, one of my falsies which I had glued on with this popped off. Also, even though I applied it correctly, it was all over my natural lashes and I had to literally pick through my eyelashes to get it all out. Grossss.
My holy gtaol eyelash glue! Fast dring for application and easy removal. Use daily for Mr At Dell demi wispies! I can reuse lash 3-5 times
Love the brush. This glue was easy to apply and my lashes stayed on all night.
Love it! Brush makes it easier to manage the amount of glue and leaves the lashes cleaner!
I never wore fake lashes before But now I started and my friends recommend this glue and so do I! It's the best!

reviews.review_title: Works just like it always has just made easier
reviews.review_text: I believe it works great. It hold as DUO always has but with the convenience of a brush application. The traditional glue used to always squirt all over my lashes so this has saved me & my lashes & a lot of ready time.
Applied glue, waited 30 seconds and tried to stick on last. Didn't stick. Unfortunate because I really wanted to love this glue.

This product is Latex Free and safe for contact lens wearers and keeps my false lashes on like nothing I have ever seen before!! I am sold!! This is ridiculously affordable and it will be a permanent staple in my makeup kit!!

reviews.review_title: Great! Falsies stayed on and looked natural
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: Falsies stayed on ALL night! I was so scared that they would come off and it would be so embarrassing! Definitely worth every penny even though it's slightly overpriced.
Great glue won't rip off your lashes once you decide to take it off
I am a dancer and have been using drugstore glue since I have needed falsies. This glue is so much better! I never needed to reapply and my lashes stayed on all day.

I've always used the original Duo glue because it just sticks the best. I found this brush on Duo glue and tried it. It's much easier to use. The brush applies just the right amount of glue. It dries quickly and is totally clear. One tube will last a long time.
It's great, and I like the formula
I decided to buy this to go along with some lashes that I bought because this glue got such good reviews. I wore this to work today and i had to reapply three times.

I've been using DUO for years, so when I saw this in store, I thought I'd give it a try seeing as how the brush would make it easier to apply. And while the brush is definitely a nice feature, the product itself is definitely too watery and isn't strong enough to keep my lashes on, regardless of density. And it left my eyes red and itchy..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a glue that I can purchase easily in the states because I usually use Japanese brands. This led me to Duo brand adhesives. I prefer the brush applicator of this one to the bottle applicator of the original formula I owned. The reason I bought this one was because it is latex-free, which is said to be better for sensitive eyes or contact wearers. I was initially worried that the glue wouldn't be very strong, but it did work quite well for me. Would purchase again.
I really like the application brush, however the adhesive isn't as strong as the original version. I will not be purchasing this again.
Came coagulated and smelled of ammonia. No thanks.
Same great formula but now with an easy applicator! About time!
Love this! It's fast drying and keeps my lashes on. It's also not too strong that I can't remove my lashes. Dries clear, awesome.
I have tried different glues but I find this adhesive best so far. It makes lash application so easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the only lash glue I use! The brush makes it so easy, and it doesn't smell weird or irritate my watery eyes like the regular Duo glue, which I believe is because this one is latex free. Holds your lashes on securely all day, never feels like its going to fall off or flake, dries clear (I use an angle brush to cover the shininess of the glue line with eyeshadow), and doesn't tug too much when taking the lashes off, by the end of the day I can just pull my lash off without even using a remover. The bottle gets a little gunky quickly, but I think that goes for mostly all lash glues.
Only 6$ in the store!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I found this! I've been using the Duo in the squeeze tube and it took forever to dry. This one dries probably 3x as fast, which is great for on the go people.
it's far the best glue I have used, I guess everyone who gave one star just used it in a wrong way snd it's easy to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The best affordable lash adhesive in my book. Just give the lashes at least 30-60 seconds to get tacky after glue application. BUT Sephora is charging 3 to 4 more dollars than any other store or website charges for this glue. Will always purchase elsewhere.

This is probably my favorite glue on the market. It sets quickly and leaves no excess glue when lashes are applied. The only problem I have is with the package design. When the product is brand new and you take the wand out, it creates an air bubble and pushes a lot of the product out when you replace it which creates a huge sticky mess.

Ordered this online, when I opened the package I saw that it says do not freeze. I live in Canada so that's impossible for it not to freeze when shipped during the winter months. It's all dried up and useless. Sephora needs to put a warning on the product page

Okay, I cannot stress enough how much I adore this product. Sephora used to carry a tiny, iridescent, eyelash glue that was not their brand that came with a pair of eyelashes, but they discontinued it. And I cried, at both stores that I went to that told be they didn't have it anymore.  So, I finally asked a third store if they had something similar and they gave me this.... PEOPLE.... It's exactly the same! u2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0f  It keeps rhinestones on my skin, eyelashes on my lids, and could probably glue my whole body to the ceiling if I wanted to.  Try it. It dries fast. Dries clear. Adheres amazingly.

This is now one of my favorite eyelash glue. I used to use the other DUO adhesive and noticed that my eyelids were constantly itchy but never realized that it was the glue that was causing my eyelids to itch until i woke up one day with a bruised eyelid, I immediately did my research and found out that many eyelash glues cause allergic reactions due to certain ingredients. The ingredient that eyelash adhesives use is FORMALDEHYDE!! Please do not use eyelash adhesives if you notice you have an allergic reaction, and if you do and cant live without falsies like me, pleaseee purchase the DUO Brush On Adhesive.. It is the glue you NEED if you have an allergic reaction, it works the same and if not better than the other duo adhesives.

I started using false eyelashes a couple months ago and went into Sephora to buy some glue. This particular type of Duo glue was recommended by a sales associate.  I typically wear falsies for up to 16 hours a day and the glue keeps them right in place. I apply the glue to the eyelashes and let them dry a little so the glue is tacky, then apply the false lashes to my eyelashes. The glue allows me to adjust the falsies if I need to because it takes a minute to completely dry. The glue doesn't clump and it's easy to build if need be. After the day is done, the falsies are easy to take off and the glue hasn't snagged any of my real eyelashes so I have no complaints.  I also wear contacts so my eyes are kind of sensitive, but the glue hasn't irritated my eyes at all. Hope this helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been repurchasing & using the DUO black lash adhesive for many years now until I discovered this in-store while shopping one day. Then again, knowing it has less chemicals & gets the job done, $12 is a good investment.
